title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Meet the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse—classic comfort, effortless precision, and timeless reliability. Designed for all-day productivity, this iconic trackball eliminates the need to move your arm, reducing strain while delivering smooth, accurate cursor control with its 300 DPI optical tracking. Whether you’re navigating spreadsheets, editing photos, or browsing the web, the sculpted ambidextrous shape fits both left- and right-handed users comfortably.

Plug-and-play simplicity meets universal compatibility with both USB and PS/2 connections, making it a smart choice for modern setups and legacy systems alike. Two intuitive buttons keep your workflow streamlined, while side-to-side scrolling makes wide documents and web pages easy to scan. Compact yet stable at approximately 7 x 4 x 2.5 inches, it stays put on your desk so your hand can do less—and achieve more.

Available in striking red, gray, and white accents, the Trackman Marble 2017 blends proven Logitech engineering with a clean, professional look. Enjoy precise control, reduced fatigue, and dependable performance that stands the test of time. Upgrade your desk with the trackball that’s as comfortable as it is capable.
